item.title: Machine Learning Algorithm Implementation (1): Linear Regression
item.description: Linear Regression Goal fit a linear model, using only the numpy library visualize the output, using the matplotlib library Implementation Methods iterative updates (coordinate descent) linear algebra Verification compare our output to the output of using library sklearn. Click the title to access the implementation in Jupyter Notebook 1. Import Library Firstly we should import the relevant libraries (numpy, matplotlib, etc.).
